welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Great Neck, the charming and vibrant city known for its beautiful scenery and diverse culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Great Neck has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at JFK, primarily used by international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A small terminal used by Delta Air Lines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at JFK, used by multiple airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A modern terminal used by JetBlue Airways for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A terminal used by multiple airlines for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A terminal used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
